welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Grosse Pointe Farms, where the charm of a small town meets the beauty of the Great Lakes. Known for its stunning waterfront views and friendly community, we invite you to explore and experience all that our town has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit City Airport serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Detroit City Airport serves international flights for select airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Windsor Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Windsor Airport serves smaller regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Selfridge ANGB Airport, serving both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for military flights and personnel at Selfridge ANGB Airport.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: McNamara Terminal
terminals.description: The McNamara Terminal is the main terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport. It is known for its modern and spacious design, featuring a large central atrium and a variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport is the newest terminal, opened in 2008. It features a more compact design and serves mostly low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be limited in certain areas.
